original_title: Ricardo Arjona - Hecho a la Antigua
overview: "Together with more than 30 musicians from the world and from this country, the concert that I always dreamed of and where I never sang, from the land where I was born. Made in the old way, from old Guatemala."  The songs closer than ever
tagline: Ricardo Arjona - Made to the Old
title: Ricardo Arjona - Made to the Old
